content: this beautiful crochet headband is featuring an interesting stitch pattern and a twist knot at the front **don t miss a thing ** subscribe to my free newsletter 1 to stay updated with new free crochet patterns tutorials and other yarnie things my youtube channel 2 follow my fb page myhobbyiscrochet 3 for daily free crochet pattern links share your projects and get advice in our facebook group my hobby is crochet 4 follow me on instagram 5 get more crochet inspiration in my pinterest boards 6 1 https //landing mailerlite com/webforms/landing/n1x3g9 2 https //www youtube com/@myhobbyiscrochetblog 3 https //www facebook com/myhobbyiscrochet ref=hl 4 https //www facebook com/groups/myhobbyiscrochet/ 5 https //www instagram com/myhobbyiscrochet/ hl=de 6 https //www pinterest de/myhobbyiscroche/
